Hi! I'm Bot, your new well-being robot! 

Each day you can complete a daily check-in, and write in your journal. 

If you're having any problems with the app, check out the profile page for help.
Let\'s get to know each other! Choose up to 3 items from this list that you\'d like to work on together. (optional)
Looks like it\'s time for your daily check-in! Tap here to open the app and get started.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

This app is a journal and a mood tracker. The main interface is the home screen, where you can chat with a bot to record mood data and journal entries. 

The next page is the Dashboard. This page allows you to see your activity on the app, and keep track of your progress over the past few days. 

The last page to mention is the Profile page. This page shows your name and selected focus topics, and links to the help, preferences, and feedback pages. The preferences page allows you to change your notification settings, and feedback page provides a space to report bugs or give feedback about your experience. 

Please note - This app is still in an early development stage, meaning there may be less functionality in this version than there will be in future. You may also notice bugs or parts of the app that aren't working as they should. If you are able to report these using the 'Send Feedback' button found on the profile page, that's greatly appreciated. Any and all feedback, feature requests, or bug reports are welcome to help improve the app. 
Thanks for your support!

When you first open the application, Bot will greet you and ask if you'd like to complete a mood check-in. To start the mood check-in, you can reply saying yes, or say no if you'd like to leave it for now. 

Once you have started the mood check-in, you can skip any question that you don't want to answer by saying anything like "skip" or "I can't answer". 

If you have completed your check in for one day, starting another check-in on the same day will overwrite your saved data for that date. Starting another check-in on the next day will be saved separately as a new check-in

When you first start using the application, by default you will receive daily notifications to remind you to complete a check-in. You can disable or enable this feature from the preferences page. \n\nOn the preferences page you will also find settings that will allow you to change how often you are reminded, and what time of day you are reminded.
